subject: The Skinny: Monday, May 21, 2007
body:

GOP Losing Battle Of The Internet
 
Democrats have taken a big early 
      edge over Republicans in one of the key arenas where the 2008 presidential 
      contest will be played out: the Internet. 
 
And the generation gap between rich 
      and poor is growing.
 
Joel Roberts has 
      the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...
